get.description: Base / root URL of the agknowledge API. Useful for version information and health checks.

HTTP GET method that implements the retrieval of the parcel usage summary for the given API Key 
 of the agknowledge API. 

It supports the following options:
- regstartdate: Registered start date of the parcels; default: "1970-01-01"
- regenddate: Registered end date of the parcels; default: "2099-12-31"

get.description:
HTTP GET endpoint that implements the retrieval of the parcel list endpoint for product `visible` which lists all parcels of the given API Key 
    and the visible product for the given date (or closest match to it) from the agknowledge API.

It supports the following options:
- date: listing every visible product for this date (or closest match) over all parcels of the API key; default: today()
- crop, name, entity, promotion filters for filtering the parcel list itself; defaults: ""
- geoformat: define the output format for the parcel geometries; default: GeoJSON
- source filter: data source filter for the product (e.g. 'sentinel2', 'landsat8'); default: 'combined'
- limit: limit the returned parcels; default: 20 (max 100 allowed)

parameters.description: Search date filter string. Results will be the closest match regarding the date.

schema.title: Date
schema.description: Search date filter string. Results will be the closest match regarding the date.

parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product.

schema.description: Data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product.

parameters.name: source

401.description: Authentication Error: user authentication against API

403.description: Authorization Error: user permissions on resource level

422.description: Validation Error: validation of request data failed

get.description:
HTTP GET endpoint that implements the retrieval of the visible raster product list as JSON Objects for the given parameters
of the agknowledge API.

It supports the following options:
- source filter: data source filter for the product (e.g. 'sentinel2', 'landsat8'); default: 'combined'
- startdate: start date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list; default: '1970-01-01'
- enddate: end date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list; default: '2099-12-31'
- delta_days: Offset days after startdate, which should appear in the product list. If the enddate parameter is given too, then the one which is closer to startdate will be applied; default: None
- order: Order ascending or descending product list by date; default: desc (latest first)
- offset: Offset for pagination
- limit: limit the returned parcels; default: 6000 (max 6000 allowed)

parameters.description: Filter data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product list.

schema.description: Filter data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product list.

parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Start date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list.

parameters.name: startdate

parameters.description: End date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list.

schema.description: End date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list.

get.description:
HTTP GET endpoint that implements the retrieval of the visible raster product for the given parameters of the agknowledge API. It supports the following options: - raster_id: ID of the requested raster product; with or without file extension
**Allowed extensions** - .json - .png - legend: return a legend image for the product; default: false - colormap: Color map for the resulting png image; default: product's default colormap - smoothBoundary: Apply interpolation & smoothing on the boundary pixels to fit result image to parcel's boundary; default: true for PNGs, false for GeoTiffs ### Example True Color image (RGB) `https://geocledian.com/agknow/api/v4/parcels/4483/visible/sentinel2/4373343.png?key=39553fb7-7f6f-4945-9b84-a4c8745bdbec`

### Example True Color image (RGB bright) `https://geocledian.com/agknow/api/v4/parcels/4483/visible/sentinel2/4373343.png?key=39553fb7-7f6f-4945-9b84-a4c8745bdbec&colormap=rgb_bright`

### Example Color infrared image (CIR) `https://geocledian.com/agknow/api/v4/parcels/4483/visible/sentinel2/4373343.png?key=39553fb7-7f6f-4945-9b84-a4c8745bdbec&colormap=cir`

parameters.description: Data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product.

schema.description: Data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product.

parameters.name: source

parameters.description:
ID of the requested raster product - with or without file extension.

**Allowed extensions**
.json
.png

schema.title: Raster Id
schema.description:
ID of the requested raster product - with or without file extension.

**Allowed extensions**
.json
.png

parameters.name: raster_id

parameters.description: Apply interpolation & smoothing on the boundary pixels to fit result image to parcel's boundary

schema.title: Smoothboundary
schema.description: Apply interpolation & smoothing on the boundary pixels to fit result image to parcel's boundary

parameters.name: smoothBoundary

parameters.description: EPSG code for requested image. Resulting image will be transformed into the given EPSG code's spatial reference system.

schema.title: Epsg
schema.description: EPSG code for requested image. Resulting image will be transformed into the given EPSG code's spatial reference system.

parameters.name: epsg

parameters.description: Color map for the resulting png image.

schema.description: Color map for the resulting png image.

parameters.name: colormap

get.description:
HTTP GET endpoint that implements the retrieval of the ndvi raster product list as JSON Objects for the given parameters
of the agknowledge API.

It supports the following options:
- source filter: data source filter for the product (e.g. 'sentinel2', 'landsat8'); default: 'combined'
- startdate: start date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list; default: '1970-01-01'
- enddate: end date for the product list. May be used to limit the time range of the product list; default: '2099-12-31'
- delta_days: Offset days after startdate, which should appear in the product list. If the enddate parameter is given too, then the one which is closer to startdate will be applied; default: None
- lon: Longitude for coordinate query; default: None
- lat: Latitude for coordinate query; default: None
- order: Order ascending or descending product list by date; default: desc (latest first)
- offset: Offset for pagination
- limit: limit the returned parcels; default: 6000 (max 6000 allowed)

get.description:
HTTP GET endpoint that implements the retrieval of the ndvi raster product for the given parameters of the agknowledge API. It supports the following options: - raster_id: ID of the requested raster product; with or without file extension
**Allowed extensions** - .json - .png - .tif - statistics: return statistics per raster product or not; default: false - lon: Longitude for coordinate query; default: None - lat: Latitude for coordinate query; default: None - legend: return a legend image for the product; default: false - epsg: EPSG code for requested image. Resulting image will be transformed into the given EPSG code's spatial reference system; default: None (original projection of data source) - colormap: Color map for the resulting png image; default: product's default colormap - smoothBoundary: Apply interpolation & smoothing on the boundary pixels to fit result image to parcel's boundary; default: true for PNGs, false for GeoTiffs

parameters.description: Data source (i.e. sensor/satellite) for the product.

.png
.tif

get.description:
HTTP GET method that implements the retrieval of the parcel list as JSON Objects for the given parameters
 of the agknowledge API.

It supports the following options:
- crop, name, entity, promotion filters for filtering the parcel list itself; defaults: ""
- geoformat: define the output format for the parcel geometries; default: GeoJSON
- limit: limit the returned parcels; default: 1000 (max 6000 allowed)
- order: Order ascending or descending product list by date; default: desc (latest first)
- offset: Offset for pagination
- count: return only the number of parcels of the (filtered) request; default: false
- extended: return additional attributes of the parcel

ParcelMessageCodeEnum.title: ParcelMessageCodeEnum
ParcelMessageCodeEnum.description:
Enum for the code of the message.

"ParcelCreate": a new parcel has been created, new parcel_id delivered to user. The message has this "message_content": {"geometry": "Parcel geometry currently outside of monitoring regions"} if the parcel was created outside a valid monitoring area. In this case no satellite data will available.
"ParcelProcessing": Processing the data for the new parcel has started (in rare cases this may happen more than once)
"ParcelProcessed": The processing of the new parcel is finished, all available data for this parcel is available
"ParcelDataUpdate": there is new satellite data available for a parcel -> a new raster_id has been added (including new products/images) (this happens during the initial parcel processing, every time a historic satellite image has been processed for this new parcel. But also later, every time a parcel is updated with new data)
"ProductUpdate": data has been updated for this parcel (e.g. because we reprocessed data). In this case the raster ids change for the products of a certain date
"ParcelDataDelete": data has been deleted for this parcel
"ParcelDelete": parcel has been deleted
